scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir dist /s /q && mkdir dist
scripts.build:css: lessc --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --rebase" --autoprefix --clean-css src/css/spotlight.less src/css/spotlight.css && csso src/css/spotlight.css --output src/css/spotlight.css && cpx "src/css/spotlight.css" dist/css/
scripts.build:css:bundle: cpx "src/css/spotlight.less" tmp/ && lessc --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --rebase" --autoprefix --clean-css tmp/spotlight.less tmp/spotlight.css && csso tmp/spotlight.css --output tmp/spotlight.css && cpx "tmp/spotlight.css" tmp/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:bundle && node task/bundle && npm run build:css:bundle && npm run build:js && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:extern && npm run copy && echo Build Complete. && exit 0
